Panel.headerText: This is an expandable Panel with landmark role region

Text.text: Represents the ARIA role Region. A section of a page, that is important enough to be included in a page summary or table of contents.

Panel.headerText: This is an expandable Panel with landmark role form

Text.text: Represents the ARIA role Form. A landmark region that contains a collection of items and objects that, as a whole, create a form.

Panel.headerText: This is an expandable Panel with landmark role complementary

Text.text: Represents the ARIA role complementary. A section of the page, designed to be complementary to the main content at a similar level in the DOM hierarchy.
